duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead requirements elicitation with key stakeholders and assist in the development and maintenance of data analytics products.
Collaborate with Product Owner and stakeholders to understand business goals and objectives.
Conduct refinement sessions, backlog management, and facilitate agile ceremonies and elicitation sessions.
Develop and conduct product presentations and demonstrations to communicate the value, benefits, and features to various stakeholders.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and perform change management activities in support of product releases.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
